You arrive in a kitchen. A standard one. You begin looking for stuff.

Were you looking for a fridge? Because look over there, it's a fridge. The fridge is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever! You can make out a closed oven. You see a table. But there isn't a thing on it. You see a counter. You see a cookbook on the counter. You scan the room, seeing a stove. The stove is conventional. But there isn't a thing on it. You make a mental note to not get your hopes up the next time you see a stove in a room.
